'''''Who Let the Dogs Out''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to set [[Toratarou]] free. [[Toratarou]] can be found caged in the southeast corner of [[Jinren Island]], and freed with a [[Metal Key]].

==Trivia==
* The achievement name is a reference to the song {{w|Who Let the Dogs Out}} by the {{w|Baha Men}}.
